name: thriftily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows careful use of money or resources (= fuel, water, or other useful things): He called on the country to live thriftily and find ways to make our society more efficient. There are many ways of using energy thriftily. See
thrifty
More examplesFewer examplesMotorists are thriftily running their old cars for longer before replacing them.It's the duty of conscientious fish cooks to use their raw materials wisely and thriftily.He ignored millions of older people on modest incomes who have saved thriftily for their retirement.
